page.title: 20HOW CARLISLE IS CHANGING
page.content: <summary of an interview with town planners at the Civic Centre> Carlisle has changed very much in the last twenty years.Near Willow Holme large areas were demolished to make room for through roads.Housing estates in outer suburbs have grown rapidly. New schools,the Cumberland General Infirmary and local govt. offices have been built.Just outside this block are a large new shopping centre and a big sports centre,also new. Carlisle has a new town plan for the next tn years.It is based on two assumptions:the city will not grow as fast,but there will not be any great loss of jobs.In this block,the main task will be to fill in empty sites. Older estates near the town centre may be renewed.The plan now is to improve housing and shopping facilities and to preserve Carlisle's historic buildings
